item.description: PLEASE NOTE: THIS EVENT IS GOING ON AT THE SAME TIME AS THE MANCHESTER HOLIDAY PARADE SO OUR VOLUNTEER BASE WILL BE SPREAD VERY THIN. WE COULD USE YOUR HELP. https://www.facebook.... Description Join us in Portsmouth for outreach at the annual Holiday Parade and Tree Lighting as we partake in the festivities and reach out to potential voters. This is not a time for debate... it's a time to hand out free Ron Paul goodies! We will have some materials on hand, but you are also encouraged to bring your own. Come dressed for the weather. I believe the official event is rain or shine but stay safe if the forecast if for sleet or a blizzard. If you can't find us call me, shem, at 413.230.1245 Here's a link to the official event: http://www.cityofport...
item.name: Outreach at Portsmouth Holiday Parade
